text: What a sight! Hardworking cops who risk their lives and make $40 K a year, barely enough to support their families, being screamed and taunted by spoiled leftists who think they are morally superior and the cops are evil. With stoic restraint, they endure it. True heroes! https://t.co/oXYC5CEVJ1
